name: NIYOKO by Virtuals
description: NYKO is a protocol to simplify AI creativity. It offers tools that enable creators to build, curate, and efficiently tokenize AI productivity components, including models, workflows, and prompt artifacts. These assets are easily stored and accessed via the NYKO platform for immediate use. Through its built-in tokenization framework, NYKO ensures that creators earn direct economic rewards via transaction fees, cultivating a dynamic and sustainable ecosystem.
